description:
Imamura Sayaka plays the part of Rabian Rayer (Remy) on the "Cosprayers" show and is especially skilled at imitating voices. Her short height and childish behavior commonly lead people to believe she is younger than her actual age of 14.
Her name is derived from Imamura Miku (今村みく) of Denji Sentai Megaranger (電磁戦隊メガレンジャー) and Nagisa Sayaka (渚さやか) of Dengeki Sentai Changeman (電撃戦隊チェンジマン).
name: Imamura Sayaka
